replies.body: Look guys, I am going to be dead honest.  People don't know what they have until it is gone.  This server is special.  Never in my life have I seen a server with this much love before.  When i got Minecraft last year, this was my first ever Multiplayer server.  I was the biggest noob in the world.  I couldn't pvp to save my life.  When I go on other servers, I don't feel as comfortable as I do here.  Also, this is the first server where I have been active on the forums.  When I see people fight, in game and on the forums, it breaks my heart.  So until this server closes (who know when), lets enjoy it until it lasts. <3
replies.body_tagged: Look guys, I am going to be dead honest.  People don't know what they have until it is gone.  This server is special.  Never in my life have I seen a server with this much love before.  When i got Minecraft last year, this was my first ever Multiplayer server.  I was the biggest noob in the world.  I couldn't pvp to save my life.  When I go on other servers, I don't feel as comfortable as I do here.  Also, this is the first server where I have been active on the forums.  When I see people fight, in game and on the forums, it breaks my heart.  So until this server closes (who know when), lets enjoy it until it lasts. <3
